mapper.insert: insert into mycoupon(c_num, m_pk, c_code, c_isuse) values (cp_seq.nextval, #{m_pk},#{c_code},0)
mapper.select: select * from mycoupon inner join coupon_list using(c_code) where m_pk=#{m_pk}
select count(*) from mycoupon where m_pk=#{m_pk} and c_isuse=0
select count(*) from mycoupon where m_pk=#{m_pk} and c_isuse=1
select count(*) from mycoupon where m_pk=#{m_pk} and c_code=#{c_code}
